page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Quotes from local newpapers-1985. There were 12 tables at the weekly whist drive. A team of bell ringers from the parish have made history, they have won the Devon Shield for 8 bells for the first time in 55 years. The team also won the Tawstock Shield and Stratton Shield making a triple celebration. The paraochial church coouncil met in the WI room. The minutes of the last meeting having been circulated were duly confirmed and signed. Details of a coffee evening to be held for Christian Aid were discussed. A talk and demonstation on repairing china was given at Umberleigh. There was also a competition for which a item of china was a prize.
